title: Land, Politics and Nationalism: A Study of the Irish Land Question
description: Bull, Philip. Land, Politics and Nationalism - A study of the Irish land question. Dublin, Gill & Macmillan, 1996. 22 cm. x, 242 pages. Softcover. Excellent, close to new condition with only minor signs of external wear. Includes for example the following Landlords, Tenants and Agrarian Change / Pressure for Reform / Land and Nationalism / Land Agitation and a Proto-State / With an Summary of Irish Land Legislation 1848-1992 / etc.
author: Philip Bull
